column1: Table 4-98:  F-HTF Emissions from Electronics Manufacture by Compound Group (kt CO2 Eq.)

column2: Note: Emissions of F-HTFs that are not HFCs, PFCs or SF6 are not included in inventory totals and are included for informational purposes only. Emissions presented for informational purposes include HFEs, PFPMIEs, perfluoroalkylmorpholines, and perfluorotrialkylamines.
